snippet: Most of the dead appeared to be suspected militants linked to Al Qaeda, tribal leaders said, but there were also reports that several civilians had been killed.
abstract: Drone-fired missiles strike a convoy of cars returning from a wedding in a remote area of Yemen, killing at least 11 people in what appears to be the second American drone strike in a week; most of the dead are suspected militants but there are reports that several civilians were killed.

byline.contributor: Nasser Arrabyee contributed reporting from Sana, Yemen.

lead_paragraph: Most of the dead appeared to be suspected militants linked to Al Qaeda, tribal leaders said, but there were also reports that several civilians had been killed.

headline.main: Drone Strike in Yemen Hits Wedding Convoy, Killing 11
headline.print_headline: Drone Strike in Yemen Hits Wedding Convoy, Killing 11
